Bios-downloads.com is Laptops’ Bios, Schematics ,Tutorial, Bord Viwer  laptops Repair Download Center.

This site is online technician’s laptops portal.

As a buyer you are known by understanding information about membership information before ordering them. If you have any problem or any question, you can contact us in our website  Live Chat or by skype,whats app ,telegram as in the info below.We will be happy to answer your questions , and help you in any info you may need.

 REFUND POLICY
When can you cancel your order?

We sell digital products, so is not possible to be any refund once you have ordered and the process is completed (your account is activated automatically as soon as you do the payment)

You must be well informed and very secure for the file you order because In case the file will not be compatible to your device, the member doesn’t have the right to request a refund but you can contact us in any case to help you.

If for a mistake you have done multiple payments we will cancel one of your payments and refund you.


If you buy the password unlock my procedure ends in the moment when you try and it works OK

Terms & Conditions & Membership

To download files or the info in the page you must buy a membership and according to the type of membership you buy you will find the info.

for example: Membership 20 usd

The duration is 50 days and the total file downloads is 250 files

so in total, you will download 250 files for 50 days, there is no limit for download files for day

Your account will automatically be activated after payment and then you can easily use the services

Purchasing through PayPal is safe and easy.


Be careful because our team is not responsible for any incompatibility of the files with your device. We can’t guarantee the file would be completely compatible to your device but our team with its professional technicals will be always ready to help you and will do it best to find the easiest solution for your possible problem.

If you do not find the BIOS file, you can request the file at any time,

then our support team will provide it as soon as possible and you can download it easily!

We Speak English, Espanol and Italian

Working days: Monday_ Sunday, 8:00 am_ 12:00 pm

Email:  info@bios-downloads.com

Add my skype: biosfix2016@gmail.com

Whatsup: +16176147065
